segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she looks so peaceful, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she’s really that unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies right behind her, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for a big surprise when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so calm on the surface, but it’s actually chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how focused she is on that plate while everything else is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what’s really going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her and the kids is almost funny, but it’s also kind of sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she needs to wake up and pay attention before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
